snippet: President Juan Manuel Santos said that the cancer had been detected at an early stage and that doctors told him that he had a 97 percent chance of a full recovery.
abstract: Colombian Pres Juan Manuel Santos says that he will undergo surgery for prostate cancer.
lead_paragraph: President Juan Manuel Santos said that the cancer had been detected at an early stage and that doctors told him that he had a 97 percent chance of a full recovery.

headline.seo: Colombian President to Undergo Surgery for Prostate Cancer
headline.main: Colombia: President to Undergo Surgery for Prostate Cancer
headline.print_headline: Colombia: President to Undergo Surgery for Prostate Cancer
